id-71591.title: Photographer Portfolio
id-71591.post-content:
The Photographer Portfolio template uses dark design with a contemporary edge to provide everything a creative needs to showcase their work. The template includes a homepage, attractive gallery, services page, about and a contact page.

The Photographer Portfolio template has a very modern look, with plenty of customizable page elements you can change as you like without touching any code. Simple drag and drop whatever you want on the page without slowing it down. It’s a fantastic design perfect for the niche!

Key features of the Photographer Portfolio template

  • Modern dark design with a contemporary feel
  • Flexible content areas ideal for photography
  • Attractive portfolio page with interactive images
  • Can be fully customized without touching code
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-71591.post-excerpt: Dark Photographer Portfolio template with attractive portfolio and image options

id-31992.title: Organic Store
id-31992.post-content:
Want to start an online organic store but not sure how to design a professional-looking website? We’ve got you covered with the perfect organic store template. Our website template is professionally designed with built-in WooCommerce integration, that’ll help you launch your store quickly.

The template is fully customizable and includes many features such as mobile responsiveness, product gallery, social media integration, and much more. The homepage also includes a dedicated section for customers to leave feedback on products they've purchased.

Key features of the Organic Store template

  • Clean and simple design that has all the ingredients of a perfect online store
  • Global color palettes to customize your entire store
  • Deep integrations with WooCommerce
  • Lightweight and high-converting templates to boost sales and conversions
  • Compatible with leading drag and drop page builders
id-31992.post-excerpt: The perfect lightweight organic store website templates to boost sales and conversions

id-69440.title: Eyewear Store
id-69440.post-content:
The Eyewear online store template is a light and bright full screen template that makes a great first impression. It opens with a fullscreen image, heading and call to action before opening into a full width store page.

The Eyewear Store template has an upmarket feel with quality images, attractive fonts and modern layout. It is SEO-friendly, WooCommerce compatible and works with most page builders, giving you everything you need to build an online store.

Key features of the Eyewear Store template

  • Compelling eCommerce store theme for WordPress
  • Superb colors, fonts and layout
  • Designed to convert
  • Lots of options for showing products
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-69440.post-excerpt: Light and bright eCommerce template designed to sell any product effectively

id-48050.title: Brandstore
id-48050.post-content:
Let your brand shine with our Brandstore website template. The Brandstore template is a simple, clean, mobile-friendly design, helping customers shop from anywhere. The template is built to integrate with WooCommerce seamlessly, so you can start showcasing your products in minutes and accept online payments.

We also have a range of custom page templates for you to use as the foundation for your site and a range of beautiful preset designs we’ve created. It’s a modern design with a lot to recommend it, ideal for online stores.

Key features of the Brandstore template

  • High converting and lightweight online store template
  • Seamless integration with WooCommerce
  • Impressive hero image to display your best products and offers
  • Host of customization options from colors and typography to layout and more
  • Fully responsive and works perfectly well on mobile devices

id-59589.title: Lotus Spa
id-59589.post-content:
The Lotus Spa template is a feminine theme with a lovely blend of images and colors that suits the niche perfectly. The design is calm, confident and welcomes you as soon as you land.

Every page reflects the core design with comfortable colors and fonts, effective imagery and the content blocks you expect to see on the page. Everything you see can be fully customized too.

Key features of the Lotus Spa template

  • Warm and welcoming design perfect for the niche
  • Exceptional use of color, fonts and white space
  • Lots of content blocks including product and service sections
  • Effective contact page including map for ease of use
  • Social media elements built into the design
  • Fully compatible with drag and drop page builders
id-59589.post-excerpt: Relaxed spa template that’s useful for many types of beauty or wellness business

id-71556.title: Finance & Consulting
id-71556.post-content:
The Finance & Consulting template uses a fullscreen design with bold colors and fonts to make a great first impression. The template includes all the primary pages you’re likely to need including service pages, about, clients, a jobs page and contact page.

The Finance & Consulting template covers all the needs of a company in this niche. All page elements are fully customizable and you can add or remove as you see fit. With a couple of modest but impressive animations, this could be the only template you ever need.

Key features of the Finance & Consulting template

  • Elegant design with an upscale feel ideal for the niche
  • Attractive fullscreen design with customizable colors and typography
  • Includes parallax scrolling and animations
  • Entire template can be fully customized without touching code
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-71556.post-excerpt: Upscale Finance & Consulting template suitable for any business niche

id-69429.title: Blingg Jewelry
id-69429.post-content:
The Blingg Jewelry website template has an elegant feel ideal for jewelry or upmarket stores. Subtle colors, stylish fonts and great use of images and whitespace creates that feeling of luxury customers will love.

The template includes simple navigation with a shopping cart at the top and lots of space in the page for products, special offers, featured products and confidence messages. All designed to encourage shoppers to explore and to buy.

Key features of the Blingg Jewelry template

  • Elegant eCommerce theme ideal for the luxury niche
  • Superb layout with plenty of whitespace
  • Multiple options for showcasing products
  • Nice pastel colors and font choices
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-69429.post-excerpt: Stylish eCommerce template with a lot of upmarket touches to convert

id-71576.title: Blockchain Technology
id-71576.post-content:
The Blockchain Technology template has been designed for tech companies and has a very modern look and feel that reflects the niche. The template includes all the core page elements and pages you’re likely to need, along with page builder compatibility.

The design is inherently flexible with bold contrasting colors, parallax scrolling and the engagement opportunities any type of tech business could use to drum up business. It’s a very accomplished design with unique appeal!

Key features of the Blockchain Technology template

  • Accomplished design ideal for the tech niche
  • Includes all the core pages a tech business might need
  • Excellent use of color and typography
  • Flexible layouts with page builder compatibility
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-71576.post-excerpt: Blockchain Technology is a stylish design ideal for any kind of tech business

id-59455.title: Construction Company
id-59455.post-content:
The Construction Company template is a bright and engaging design with bold colors, plenty of images and lots of whitespace to add balance. The homepage includes lots of content and service areas, somewhere to show off building projects and lots more besides.

The Construction Company template comes with readymade pages for projects, services, about the company and a contact and quote page. Elements also include FAQs, testimonials, social media, a contact form and very attractive headers and footers. Everything a business needs for their online presence!

Key features of the Construction Company template

  • Bright and engaging design ideal for construction companies
  • Well-balanced design with equal areas of boldness and whitespace
  • Includes typical page elements a construction company would need
  • Template can be fully customized without touching code
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-59455.post-excerpt: Construction Company has everything a building firm needs to launch a website

id-59077.title: Recycled Shoe Store
id-59077.post-content:
The Recycled Shoe Store template is a contemporary eCommerce design with full screen image on the homepage and lots of whitespace throughout. It’s an attractive design that could be fully customized for any type of store.

The use of whitespace means images and graphics really stand out. Pages include featured product areas, calls to action and all those elements an online store needs, including an attractive checkout page.

Key features of the Recycled Shoe Store template

  • Contemporary store design with lots of white space
  • Plenty of customizable product feature blocks
  • Simple header with cart and search elements
  • Effective product pages with filters and search
  • Extra content pages that can be customized as required
  • Fully compatible with drag and drop page builders
id-59077.post-excerpt: Appealing eCommerce design ideal for a wide range of stores covering every niche

id-70901.title: Digital Product Store
id-70901.post-content:
The Digital Product Store website template is a contemporary eCommerce design designed to convert using calm colors, simple design and effective typography. It’s a relaxed design with frameless sections and a centralized product area to showcase your wares.

The Digital Product Store template includes highlighted product areas, icon-driven navigation, testimonials, subscription option and attractive supplementary pages. The entire design can be fully customized to suit any products or type of store.

Key features of the Digital Product Store template

  • Contemporary Digital Product website design
  • Calm design with engaging elements designed to convert
  • Lots of product showcase options
  • Can be fully customized for any type of online store
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-70901.post-excerpt: Contemporary digital product store template that engages right away

id-69418.title: Be Bold
id-69418.post-content:
The Be Bold template reflects the quality of many successful stores, well-chosen colors and fonts, confidence-inspiring feel and a genuine elegance that inspires you to purchase.

This is a full width template that uses every inch of screen to help create that image of a lifestyle. Amazing images, attractive product showcases and parallax effects help create the same feeling you get from well-known brand stores. All designed to help you convert.

Key features of the Be Bold template

  • Professional-quality eCommerce template
  • Superb use of colors and fonts
  • Designed to sell using images
  • Awesome layout and design
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-69418.post-excerpt: Upscale eCommerce template that inspires confidence and encourages you to buy
